title: Tsumari Suki tte Iitai n Dakedo,
original_name: つまり好きっていいたいんだけど、
sinopse:
The story will center on Chitose, a former bullied girl who became a talent manager. The celebrity she is put in charge of is a domineering actor who was a bully as a child.

(Source: ANN)

Included one-shot:
Volume 2: Oresama no Ki mo Shiranaide
